channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Shares of American Eagle plunge 13% as company issues weak holiday guidance
item.description: American Eagle issued weak holiday guidance after reporting its third sales miss in a row.

item.title: Foot Locker shares tumble as it issues gloomy holiday outlook, sees 'softness' at Nike
item.description: Foot Locker fell short of Wall Street expectations and cut its guidance after sales declined more than expected.

item.title: Now You Can Avoid Taxes Like the Rich and Famous
item.description: Technology such as AI widens access to tax-optimization strategies, including the launch of funds that explicitly seek to defer tax payments.

item.title: Oracle shares slide on earnings and revenue miss, disappointing forecast
item.description: Oracle shares fell in extended trading after the database software company issued disappointing quarterly results.

item.title: Ulta Beauty shares pop as retailer beats earnings expectations despite demand fears
item.description: The retailer hiked its full-year outlook slightly to reflect the better-than-expected results.

item.title: Lululemon stock jumps as international growth helps to offset slowing U.S. sales
item.description: Lululemon has been in a bit of a rough spot after the departure of its longtime Chief Product Officer Sun Choe.

item.title: Macy's Bargain Shares Tempt Activists Again
item.description: The newest arrivals at Macy’s have a fresh idea and some tired ones.

item.title: Behind Bitcoin's Rally Is a Simple Fact: Supplies Are Limited
item.description: Bulls argue that the token’s scarcity will fuel rising prices, with buyers scrambling to acquire the last new coins to come online.

item.title: Sterling Rises to 2.5-Year High Versus Euro, Could Gain Further Even Without U.K. Catalyst
item.description: Sterling rose to its strongest against the euro since March 2022 and could extend those gains even in the absence of any market-moving U.K. events on ...

item.title: Europe's Gas Price Eases on Milder, Windy Weather Forecast
item.description: European natural-gas prices edged higher but have fallen roughly 7% over the week on forecasts of milder weather, higher wind output and expectations ...
